name: Survive The Night (itch) (Pietro Di Giovanni (hcyan))
description:
You are a dude that fights to survive for 24 hours in a world full of zombies. Search for new weapons and believe in yourself!

This is a technical demo of a prototype I made while studying game development.

Technical Info:
Used state machine pattern for zombie behavior and player controller.
Object pooling for spawning bullets and zombies.
Observer events for the damage system.
Singleton for all Controller/Manager Classes.
